name: MouseEvent.pageX
description: The pageX read-only property of the MouseEvent interface returns the X (horizontal) coordinate (in pixels) at which the mouse was clicked, relative to the left edge of the entire document.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module
refs.description: The definition of 'pageX' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module' specification.

refs.name: Touch Events
refs.description: The definition of 'pageX' in the 'Touch Events' specification.
